hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select eotl.eo_column_name, eotl.eo_column_code, eotl.eo_column_type, eotl.eo_is_require, eotl.eo_column_header, eotl.eo_column_unique from eo_order_template_list_col eotl left join eo_order_import_template eoit on eotl.eo_template_code = eoit.job_code where 1=1 <<and eoit.customer_code = :customerCode>> <<and eoit.order_type = :orderType>> ${queryPlanDefinedSql} ${queryPlanSortSql}
